title: Best of the Program | Guest: Steve Deace | 12/17/21
description:
Glenn has a very special guest in the studio for the holidays, Karl the Elf, who has a very dark message to pass along. BlazeTV host Steve Deace joins to discuss his newest book, “Do What You Believe: Or You Won’t Be Free to Believe It Much Longer.” Glenn, Pat, and Stu discuss anthems, pop culture, and terms over the course of time.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
